Class story2

java.lang.Object
story2
public class story2 extends Object
Entry point for the turn-based clan chief simulation.

The simulation creates a Gaul clan chief in his village, a global theatre of war and runs a turn-by-turn loop where the player can manage inhabitants, send warriors to battle and observe immigration of war refugees. Every 10 turns, all characters grow one year older. The druid can be sent to a special ingredient place and asked to brew different types of magic potions chosen by the player.

    • createClanChief

      private static ClanChief createClanChief(Scanner scanner, Place homeVillage)

      Parameters:
      scanner - input source
      homeVillage - starting village
      Returns:
      the created clan chief

    • handleImmigration

      private static void handleImmigration(Place village, Place theatreOfWar)
      Handles immigration: each turn, some war refugees can arrive and settle in the Gaul village. Refugees are chosen among surviving Gaul or fantasy characters from the theatre of war.
      Parameters:
      village - clan chief village
      theatreOfWar - global battlefield
